lines.gurmukhi: pUrn prm joiq siqgur siq rUp pUrn igAwn siqgur siqnwm hY
lines.transliteration_english: Pooran Param Joti Satigur Sati Roopa , Pooran Giaan Satigur Satinaam Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: The True Guru is the true and complete form of the Radiance supreme-the Lord. The blessings of Naam to the Sikhs is the complete knowledge of the True Guru.

lines.gurmukhi: pUrn jugiq siq siq gurmiq irdY pUrn syv swDsMgiq ibsRwm hY
lines.transliteration_english: Pooran Jougati Sati Sati Gurmati Ridai , Pooran Sayv Saadhasangati Bisraam Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: The slave Sikh of the True Guru imbibes the teachings of the Guru in his heart according to the manner taught and holds it as total truth. He practices it in the holy congregation very devotedly;

lines.gurmukhi: pUrn pUjw pdwribMd mDukr mn pRym rs pUrn huie kwm inhkwm hY
lines.transliteration_english: Pooran Poojaa Padaarabind Madhoukar Mana , Praym Ras Pooran Hui Kaam Nihakaam Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: In the worship of the lotus-like feet of the True Guru, the beetle-like mind is satiated with the love elixir of Lord-like Guru and feels free from all other desires and wants.

lines.gurmukhi: pUrn bHm gur pUrn prm iniD pUrn pRgws ibsm sQl Dwm hY ]139]
lines.transliteration_english: Pooran Braham Gur Pooran Param Nidhi , Pooran Pragaas Bisam Sadal Dhaam Hai ?139?

Shabad OS B.translation: The storehouse of all treasures are the form of complete form of True Guru. By virtue of the meditation on Naam (obtained from the True Guru) the heart that feels the light effulgence of the Lord, that heart is wondrous and astonishing. (139)
